author: andschwa
body:
This has been on my docket for a while, and won't get done until an issue is being tracked.

We _need_ this. Quick thoughts:
## Issues
- require OS
- require commit or PS version
- steps/expected/actual
- search for duplicate
- label appropriately
## Pull Requests
- what/why/how
- check indentation/whitespace
- check up-to-date with master
- assign to appropriate subsystem maintainer
- branch is user/description-#issue format
title: Add Issue and Pull Request templates
